42000000.English_Text:
(Among these delicacies
Is this a delicacy?)

42000001.English_Text:
(I got rid of it,
It'll be fine for a while)
42000001.Chinese_Text:
（已经赶出去了，
一段时间应该没关系）

42000002.Chinese_Text:
（<textColor=[255:204:102:255]>找到了闪耀的</>！
<textColor=[78:148:215:255]>巴隆</>应该很喜欢吧）

42000003.English_Text:
((<textColor=[255:204:102:255]>lotus leaf shard</> what 
what are you trying to do?)

42000004.English_Text:
(It's really unpredictable 
It pops out of nowhere. 
You'll be surprised)
42000004.Chinese_Text:
（真是没有动静
突然冒出来了。
令人吃惊）

42000005.English_Text:
(If it's large enough, 
would be enough to block the rain?)
42000005.Chinese_Text:
（这种大小的话
可以挡住雨了吧？）

42000006.English_Text:
(This <textColor=[110:216:175:255]>Lumberjack</> has been occupied by the <textColor=[215:94:94:255]>Westerns</>
 . Even if I catch it, there is no end to it)
42000006.Chinese_Text:
（<textColor=[110:216:175:255]>伐木地</><textColor=[215:94:94:255]>西人</>
占领了。抓住也
抓住也没有尽头）

42000007.English_Text:
(It smells really bad.
I can't get used to it)
42000007.Chinese_Text:
（真是难闻的味道。
不适应啊）

42000008.English_Text:
(Hmm... <textColor=[215:94:94:255]>Weapon of the Westerners</>.
It doesn't look particularly useful)
42000008.Chinese_Text:
（嗯..。<textColor=[215:94:94:255]>西人族</>的武器。
看起来没什么用处）

42000009.English_Text:
(<textColor=[215:94:94:255]>Lake Turtle</>'s shell is
hard, so it's good for many uses)
42000009.Chinese_Text:
（<textColor=[215:94:94:255]>湖巨北</>的皮
坚硬，适合多方面使用）

42000010.English_Text:
(<textColor=[255:204:102:255]>a pile of garbage</>.
Who threw these things away?)
42000010.Chinese_Text:
（<textColor=[255:204:102:255]>垃圾堆</>路啊。
这些是谁扔掉的？）

42000012.English_Text:
(In this amount of time, 
the investigation should have been completed)
42000012.Chinese_Text:
（这段时间应该已经完成了
调查）

42000013.English_Text:
(this should have been enough time 
to investigate)
42000013.Chinese_Text:
（这种程度的话调查
应该是充分的时间）

42000014.English_Text:
(Is this what it is? 
At first glance, it looks like an ordinary 
stone...?)
42000014.Chinese_Text:
（就是这个啊？
乍一看很平凡的
像石头…？）

42000015.English_Text:
(Is this enough? 
The sheep are sensitive, so 
the rancher is having a hard time)
42000015.Chinese_Text:
（这程度就足够了吧？
因为羊很敏感，
牧场主很辛苦啊）

42000016.English_Text:
(It smells strange...
Is it okay to use it as a <textColor=[255:204:102:255]>medicine</>
?)
42000016.Chinese_Text:
（有一股奇妙的味道…
<textColor=[255:204:102:255]>用药材</>也可以吗？）

42000018.English_Text:
(The red is really pretty. 
It looks good for color)
42000018.Chinese_Text:
（红色真漂亮。
颜色看起来很好）

42000019.English_Text:
(It's gorgeous and 
it's even rare, so 
it must be popular)
42000019.Chinese_Text:
（既华丽又稀有
应该很有人气吧）

42000020.English_Text:
(Here it is! 
<textColor=[255:204:102:255]>Barong's Secret Book</>, 
I'm curious about the contents...)
42000020.Chinese_Text:
（在这里！
巴隆的秘方</>，
好奇内容…）

42000021.Chinese_Text:
（呼~累了。
昌道团</>的三天
越来越强）

42000022.Chinese_Text:
（在这里！
这种程度的话研究
应该就足够了）

42000023.English_Text:
(...why is this trending? 
You don't even know it)
42000023.Chinese_Text:
（…这为什么流行？
这件事真是不可思议）

42000024.English_Text:
(Huh, would this be enough? 
<textColor=[215:94:94:255]>Changdodan</> <textColor=[78:148:215:255]>Daeeobang </>This 
I'm getting a headache)
42000024.Chinese_Text:
（呼~这样就行了吧？
因为昌道丹</><textColor=[78:148:215:255]>大鱼房</>
头疼）

42000025.Chinese_Text:
（呼~累了。
暂时可以安全地散步了。）

42000026.English_Text:
(Found! <textColor=[110:216:175:255]>Ancient Forest Road</>
Looks too dangerous for ordinary people
to pass)
42000026.Chinese_Text:
（找到了！<textColor=[110:216:175:255]>古都市森林路</>
一般人经过
看起来太危险了）

42000027.English_Text:
(Really <textColor=[255:204:102:255]>solid horn</>.
This is enough for <textColor=[255:204:102:255]>medicine</> 
It will be enough to make)
42000027.Chinese_Text:
（真是<textColor=[255:204:102:255]>坚硬的角</>啊。
这种程度的话<textColor=[255:204:102:255]>药材</>
足够制作了）

42000028.Original_Text: (...왠지 <textColor=[78:148:215:255]>바롱</>이라면 \n<textColor=[215:94:94:255]>수목 정령</>을 해치지 않고 \n가지를 얻었을 거 같군)
42000028.English_Text:
(...if somehow <textColor=[78:148:215:255]>Barong</> doesn't harm <textColor=[215:94:94:255]>Arbor Spirit</> I think I got 
the eggplant without it)
42000028.Chinese_Text:
（…不知为何<textColor=[78:148:215:255]>巴隆</>的话
<textColor=[215:94:94:255]>树木精灵</>没有伤害
好像得到了树枝）

42000029.English_Text:
(<textColor=[78:148:215:255]>Ashenwind</>'s heart
I hope it's 
a little bit at ease)
42000029.Chinese_Text:
（<textColor=[78:148:215:255]>灰色的风</>的心
希望能稍微舒服一点）

42000030.English_Text:
(...<textColor=[215:94:94:255]>May the animals killed by the poaching of the Fighters</>

please sleep peacefully...)
42000030.Chinese_Text:
（…<textColor=[215:94:94:255]>啾叶丹</>的偷猎
牺牲的动物们
一定要睡得舒服…）

42000031.English_Text:
(<textColor=[215:94:94:255]>Burning</> is pouring
from the rift
infinitely
...)
42000031.Chinese_Text:
（<textColor=[215:94:94:255]>火魔</>在缝隙中
无尽地倾泻而出
…）

42000032.English_Text:
(That's really strong. 
If it wasn't for <textColor=[78:148:215:255]>Ereda</>,
the damage would have been greater)
42000032.Chinese_Text:
（真的很强啊。
<textColor=[78:148:215:255]>如果不是雷达</>，
损失会更大）

42000033.Original_Text: (충분히 모았다.\n<textColor=[255:204:102:255]>균열의 흔적</>을 연구하여\n대책을 찾을 수 있기를...)
42000033.English_Text:
(You have collected enough.
Research the <textColor=[255:204:102:255]>Traces of the crack</>
Hopefully you can find a workaround...)
42000033.Chinese_Text:
（充分收集。
研究缝隙的常见</>，
寻找对策…）

42000034.English_Text:
(Everyone has been killed. 
The wildlife in this <textColor=[110:216:175:255]>Hilllands</>
looks really wild)
42000034.Chinese_Text:
（都处理掉了。
这<textColor=[110:216:175:255]>丘陵地</>的野生动物
真的很粗暴）

42000035.English_Text:
(Looks like you got
 enough intact <textColor=[255:204:102:255]>Animal Hide</>)
42000035.Chinese_Text:
（完整的<textColor=[255:204:102:255]>动物粥</>
好像充分获得了）

42000036.English_Text:
(This is a <textColor=[78:148:215:255]>dropped by a merchant</>
<textColor=[255:204:102:255]>bottom</>this is it)

42000037.Chinese_Text:
（<textColor=[215:94:94:255]>灵魂</>拿走这个孩子的
人形</>。
奇怪的事情）

42000038.English_Text:
(...can you really appease 
<textColor=[215:94:94:255]>Spirit</> and 
wake up 
in this way...?)
42000038.Chinese_Text:
（…真的可以用这个方法
<textColor=[215:94:94:255]>灵</>，
成佛吗…？）

42000039.English_Text:
(Phew, finished.
<textColor=[215:94:94:255]>Goblin</>'s request,
It was a strange experience)
42000039.Chinese_Text:
（呼，结束了。
鬼怪</>的委托，
奇怪的经历）

42000040.Original_Text: (이 정도면 충분해.\n균열에 대한 실마리를 \n찾을 수 있으면 좋을텐데)
42000040.Chinese_Text:
（这样就足够了。
如果能找到裂缝的线索就好了。）

42000041.English_Text:
(...I found it! The <textColor=[78:148:215:255]>Suwa</> must have
wouldn't be able to afford to pack their stuff
and left busy)
42000041.Chinese_Text:
（…找到了！<textColor=[78:148:215:255]>水和族</>
没有收拾行李的余力
好像很忙地离开了）

42000042.English_Text:
(Completed the quest... 
Still in town
<textColor=[215:94:94:255]>Erosioned monster</>)
42000042.Chinese_Text:
（虽然完成了委托…
村子里还充满
侵蚀的怪兽</>）

42000043.English_Text:
(After, I'm done.
<textColor=[78:148:215:255]>I hope this was of a small 
help to the Suwa</>)
42000043.Chinese_Text:
（后，结束了。
<textColor=[78:148:215:255]>希望能对手足</>有所帮助）

42000044.Original_Text: (<textColor=[78:148:215:255]>수양</>의 협행을 완료했다. \n대부분 탐사에 필요한\n자원을 수집하는 의뢰였네)
42000044.English_Text:
(<textColor=[78:148:215:255]>Discipline</> completed the collaboration.
Most of these were quests to collect
resources needed for exploration)
42000044.Chinese_Text:
（<textColor=[78:148:215:255]>完成了水阳</>的悬赏。
大部分都是调查所需的
收集资源的委托）

42000045.English_Text:
(<textColor=[78:148:215:255]>Ereda</> thanks for your hard work
to kill <textColor=[215:94:94:255]>Burnt-headed</> The villagers
 became a little safer)
42000045.Chinese_Text:
（<textColor=[78:148:215:255]>埃瑞达</>街<textColor=[215:94:94:255]>火魔</>处置
多亏了努力，居民们
变得更加安全了）

42000046.English_Text:
(<textColor=[78:148:215:255]>Completed all 4 collaborations 
in <textColor=[78:148:215:255]>Illustration</>.
Are you expecting a reward?)
42000046.Chinese_Text:
（<textColor=[78:148:215:255]>桃花奖</>的协议
都完成了。
期待补偿？）

42000047.English_Text:
(<textColor=[78:148:215:255]>Younggyowon</>'s collaboration is somewhere
friendly and strange.
Shall we get a reward for completion?)
42000047.Chinese_Text:
（<textColor=[78:148:215:255]>永教院</>的合作在哪里
既亲切又神奇。
获得完成奖励吧？）

42000048.Original_Text: (휴, 힘들었다. <textColor=[78:148:215:255]>금경철문</>이\n더 좋은 무기를 만드는데\n도움이 되었다면 좋겠어)
42000048.English_Text:
(Phew, it was hard. <textColor=[78:148:215:255]>Geumgyeongcheolmun</>I hope this
helped you
to make a better weapon)
42000048.Chinese_Text:
（呼，累了。<textColor=[78:148:215:255]>金嘤铁门</>
对制作更好的武器
希望有帮助）

42000049.Chinese_Text:
（<textColor=[78:148:215:255]>大鱼房居民</>们的
协商充分完成）

42000050.English_Text:
((<textColor=[78:148:215:255]>Residents of Vandal Lake</>

We have already completed 4 cooperative actions reported by them!)
42000050.Chinese_Text:
（<textColor=[78:148:215:255]>半月湖的居民</>
希望能有所帮助）

42000052.Original_Text: (어디 보자... 여기 어딘가 \n<textColor=[215:94:94:255]>서인족</>이 무기를 모아둔\n상자가 있을 것 같은데...)
42000052.English_Text:
(Let's see... Somewhere here 
<textColor=[215:94:94:255]>Western people</>there seems to be a
box of these weapons...)
42000052.Chinese_Text:
（让我看看..。这里好像有
<textColor=[215:94:94:255]>西人</>收集这武器的
箱子…）

42000053.English_Text:
(The surrounding threats
have been adequately dealt with)
42000053.Chinese_Text:
（周围的威胁
已经处理好了）

42000054.Original_Text: (좋아! 이 정도면 \n<textColor=[255:204:102:255]>약초</>를 채집할 수 \n있을 것 같아)
42000054.Chinese_Text:
（好！这种程度的话
<textColor=[255:204:102:255]>药草</>可以采集
）

42000055.Chinese_Text:
（周围的威胁
充分消除了）

42000056.English_Text:
(Let's see. There must be a 
<textColor=[255:204:102:255]>weapon chest</> somewhere...)
42000056.Chinese_Text:
（让我看看。
应该有武器箱子</>…）

42000058.English_Text:
(This is enough.
Now, let's retrieve the <textColor=[255:204:102:255]>Botzym</>)
42000058.Chinese_Text:
（这样就足够了。
现在<textColor=[255:204:102:255]>回收包袱</>）

42000059.Chinese_Text:
（妨碍的<textColor=[215:94:94:255]>斗夜团</>
充分处理了）

42000060.English_Text:
(The threats around me
have been sufficiently removed.
Let's collect <textColor=[255:204:102:255]>Suwa's luggage</>)
42000060.Chinese_Text:
（行李周围的威胁
充分消除了。
收集和行李</>）

42000061.Original_Text: (휴~ 힘들었다. 그나저나, \n<textColor=[255:204:102:255]>난파선</>에 타고 있던 \n사람들은 어떻게 됐을까?)
42000061.English_Text:
(Huh, it was hard. By the way, what happened to the 
people on the 
<textColor=[255:204:102:255]>wreck</>?)
42000061.Chinese_Text:
（呼~好累啊话说回来，
乘坐遇难船</>的
人们怎么样了？）

42000062.English_Text:
(I got enough. 
It's poisonous, so 
You shouldn't eat it carelessly)
42000062.Chinese_Text:
（得到了很多。
听说有毒性，不能随便吃。）

42000063.English_Text:
(This is enough. 
The taste is excellent,
I'll have to try it sometime)
42000063.Chinese_Text:
（这程度就足够了。
味道好极了，
什么时候尝一尝吧）

42000064.Chinese_Text:
（终于结束了。
<textColor=[78:148:215:255]>调查员</>们可以安全地参观
）

42000065.English_Text:
(Let's take a break from safety
<textColor=[255:204:102:255]>Gather half moon grass</>!)
42000065.Chinese_Text:
（趁着安全的空隙
采集半月草</>！）

42000066.English_Text:
(This is it! 
Does it smell good?)

42000067.English_Text:
(I have collected enough.
It's sturdy, so it would be perfect if I made it into armor.)
42000067.Chinese_Text:
（充分收集起来了。
因为很结实，用盔甲制作的话正好。）

42000069.English_Text:
(I saved them all.
It was a pretty tricky mission)
42000069.Chinese_Text:
（都找到了。
任务相当复杂）

42000070.English_Text:
(This should be enough for all of the <textColor=[78:148:215:255]>Discipline</>
to be satisfied)
42000070.Chinese_Text: （这种程度的话<textColor=[78:148:215:255]>首阳大院</>全部都可以吃饱）

42000071.English_Text:
(Phew, it's a bit safer.
Come on, let's gather <textColor=[255:204:102:255]>Swamp Herb</>)
42000071.Chinese_Text:
（呼，有点安全了。
快点<textColor=[255:204:102:255]>采集沼泽药草</>）

42000072.Original_Text: (하얗고 예쁜 꽃이네.\n진흙 속에서 자랐다는 게\n믿기지 않을 정도야)
42000072.Chinese_Text:
（又白又漂亮的花啊。
长在泥土里，简直不敢相信。）

42001000.English_Text:
(It's really oily. 
If you dry it well, 
it'll be a good fuel)
42001000.Chinese_Text:
（真的很油腻啊。
晒干后使用的话
作为燃料毫不逊色）

42001001.Original_Text: (<textColor=[215:94:94:255]>밀림 거미</>의 거미줄은 \n정말 굵고 튼튼하군. \n연구할 가치가 있어 보여)
42001001.English_Text:
(<textColor=[215:94:94:255]>Jungle Spider</>'s web is 
really thick and sturdy. 
Looks worth studying)
42001001.Chinese_Text:
（<textColor=[215:94:94:255]>丛林蜘蛛</>的蜘蛛网
真的很粗很结实。
看起来很有研究价值）

42001002.English_Text:
(That's enough. Now 
<textColor=[215:94:94:255]>bear</> and <textColor=[215:94:94:255]>tiger</> I have no choice but to wait for 
to come back...)
42001002.Chinese_Text:
（这程度就足够了。现在
<textColor=[215:94:94:255]>熊</>和<textColor=[215:94:94:255]>老虎</>只能等待回来
）

42001003.English_Text:
(I found it! This is it. 
I was so focused on herbs, I must have forgotten the <textColor=[255:204:102:255]>Secret Book</>)
42001003.Chinese_Text:
（找到了！就是这个。
集中精神于药草
<textColor=[255:204:102:255]>秘方</>忘记了吧）

42001004.English_Text:
(Okay. If a defense is 
built here, the base will be 
much safer)
42001004.Chinese_Text:
（好吧。这里的防御设施
建成后据点
会更加安全）

42001005.English_Text:
(Phew, finished.
Now <textColor=[78:148:215:255]>Ereda</>
it's time to finish)
42001005.Chinese_Text:
（呼，结束了。
现在是<textColor=[78:148:215:255]>雷达</>
该结束了）

42001006.Original_Text: (충분히 얻었다. \n<textColor=[215:94:94:255]>오똑 발발이</>의 풀은 \n짙은 연두색을 낼 것 같아)
42001006.English_Text:
(I got enough. 
<textColor=[215:94:94:255]>The grass of the <textColor=[215:94:94:255]>I think the grass will be a deep yellow green)
42001006.Chinese_Text:
（得到了充分的好处。
<textColor=[215:94:94:255]>高高的脚尖</>的草
好像会有深绿色）

42001007.English_Text:
(Mission accomplished. 
The number has decreased a bit, but 
it's still noisy)
42001007.Chinese_Text:
完成任务
虽然数量有所减少，
还是很吵啊）

42001008.English_Text:
(I got them all. 
The chewy texture
I think it's excellent)
42001008.Chinese_Text:
（都救了。
有嚼劲的口感
好像是一流的）

42001009.Original_Text: (<textColor=[255:204:102:255]>거북알</>을 구했다. \n남획으로 인해 멸종되는 \n일은 없어야 할 텐데...)
42001009.English_Text:
(<textColor=[255:204:102:255]>I found turtle eggs</>.
There should be no extinction due to overfishing...)
42001009.Chinese_Text:
（<textColor=[255:204:102:255]>获得龟卵</>。
不应该发生因滥捕而灭绝的
事情…）

42001010.English_Text:
(<textColor=[110:216:175:255]>Even in the Sea and Moon continent</>
The hard <textColor=[255:204:102:255]>Turtle's shell</> is 
It is useful)
42001010.Chinese_Text:
（<textColor=[110:216:175:255]>在海月大陆</>中
坚硬的<textColor=[255:204:102:255]>乌龟的甲壳</>
有用啊）

42001011.English_Text:
(Defeated them all.
<textColor=[78:148:215:255]>Myunghyedan</> is <textColor=[110:216:175:255]>Wreck of a shipwreck</> Are you planning to explore
?)
42001011.Chinese_Text:
（全部处置。
明慧丹</>计划探测遇难船的残骸</>吗？）

42001012.English_Text:
(Phew, it was hard.
The <textColor=[215:94:94:255]>crocodiles</> here
are really aggressive)
42001012.Chinese_Text:
（呼，累了。
这里的<textColor=[215:94:94:255]>雷克顿</>
攻击性真强）

42001013.Chinese_Text:
（真是又坚韧又坚固啊。
制作篮子
应该很合适吧）

42001014.Original_Text: (<textColor=[255:204:102:255]>봇짐</>을 찾았다. \n거점 주변이 조금 더 \n안전해지면 좋을 텐데)
42001014.English_Text:
(<textColor=[255:204:102:255]>Found the bots</>. 
It would be nice if the area around the base was a little more 
safe)
42001014.Chinese_Text:
（<textColor=[255:204:102:255]>找到包袱</>。
据点周围再安全一点就好了）

42001015.Chinese_Text:
（任务完成了。
消灭血友病</>需要大量人员）

42001016.English_Text:
(Defeated them all.
The ones with the hood are definitely stronger)
42001016.Chinese_Text:
（全部消灭。
头巾的人
确实更强）

42001017.English_Text:
(If you look in a dark place
it can be really confusing)
42001017.Chinese_Text:
（在黑暗的地方看的话
真的会混淆）

42001018.Original_Text: (...독도 약에 쓰이니\n<textColor=[215:94:94:255]>투연초</>도 연구해 볼\n가치가 있을 거야)
42001018.Chinese_Text:
（…用于独岛药，
<textColor=[215:94:94:255]>斗莲草</>也值得研究
）

42001019.English_Text:
(Phew, it was hard.
By the way... you really look alike)
42001019.Chinese_Text:
（呼，累了。
话说回来..。真像啊）

42001020.English_Text:
(This should be enough to 
get you through safely)

42001021.Original_Text: (됐다. 이 정도면 \n<textColor=[78:148:215:255]>바롱</>이 안전하게 조사를 \n진행할 수 있을 거야)
42001021.English_Text:
(Okay. This will allow 
<textColor=[78:148:215:255]>Barong</>
to safely proceed with the investigation)
42001021.Chinese_Text:
好了。这种程度的话
<textColor=[78:148:215:255]>巴隆</>可以安全地进行调查
）

42001022.English_Text:
(That deadly looking 
<textColor=[215:94:94:255]>Snake Mushroom</> poison
used as medicine... It's amazing)
42001022.Chinese_Text:
（我看起来致命的
<textColor=[215:94:94:255]>蛇蘑菇</>的毒药
用..。好神奇啊）

42001023.English_Text:
(<textColor=[215:94:94:255]>Soulfire</> removed.
I didn't see anything strange...)
42001023.Chinese_Text:
（<textColor=[215:94:94:255]>灵魂佛</>清除完毕。
没看到奇怪的东西…）

42001024.Original_Text: (드디어 끝마쳤군.\n<textColor=[215:94:94:255]>혈비패</>는 뭘 얻기 위해\n묘지에 온 걸까?)
42001024.English_Text:
(Finally finished.
What did the <textColor=[215:94:94:255]>Blood Plaque</> come to the cemetery for
to get?)
42001024.Chinese_Text:
（终于结束了。
血雨牌</>是为了得到什么而来到墓地的呢？）

42001025.English_Text:
(This is enough. 
It's a panacea... 
It would be great if it was made)
42001025.Chinese_Text:
（这程度就足够了。
万病止痛药…
做出来就好了）

42001026.English_Text:
(A strange type of weapon. 
It looks worth researching)
42001026.Chinese_Text:
（是陌生形态的武器啊。
看起来很有研究价值）

42001027.Original_Text: (이 정도면 충분하겠지? \n<textColor=[215:94:94:255]>담인초</>는 봐도 봐도 \n적응이 되지 않는군)
42001027.English_Text:
(Isn't this enough? 
<textColor=[215:94:94:255]>Gingerwort</> doesn't look like it 
I can't get used to it)
42001027.Chinese_Text:
（这程度就足够了吧？
<textColor=[215:94:94:255]>淡醋</>看了也觉得
不适应啊）

42001028.Original_Text: (휴, 겨우 끝마쳤다. \n<textColor=[215:94:94:255]>낙원족</>은 공격성이 강해서 \n상대하기가 만만치 않군)
42001028.English_Text:
(Phew, I just finished it. 
<textColor=[215:94:94:255]>Paradise</> are very aggressive, 
It's hard to deal with)
42001028.Chinese_Text:
好不容易才结束。
<textColor=[215:94:94:255]>乐园族</>攻击性强，
很难对付）

42001029.English_Text:
(I got them all!
<textColor=[110:216:175:255]>It's as big and hard as a lotus leaf in Half Moon Lake</>)
42001029.Chinese_Text:
（都救了！
半月湖</>的荷叶一样
又大又结实啊）

42001030.English_Text:
(Like the wind of <textColor=[78:148:215:255]>Myunghyedan</>
hope this place will be preserved for a long time)
42001030.Chinese_Text:
（<textColor=[78:148:215:255]>明慧丹</>的风一样
希望这里能长久保存）

42001031.Original_Text: (휴, 임무를 완수했다. \n언뜻 보면 수풀처럼 보여 \n더 위험한 것 같아)
42001031.English_Text:
(Phew, mission accomplished. 
At first glance, it looks like a bush, 
I think it's more dangerous)
42001031.Chinese_Text:
（呼，完成任务了。
乍一看像树林
好像更危险）

42001032.English_Text:
((<textColor=[215:94:94:255]>Tricolor</>) 
I have collected enough oil. 
This should be enough)
42001032.Chinese_Text:
（<textColor=[215:94:94:255]>三色鸟</>的油
足够了。
这样就足够了）

42001033.English_Text:
(Thanks to the flowing waterfall,
the water will be purified quickly)
42001033.Chinese_Text:
（多亏了流动的瀑布
水会很快净化）

42001034.English_Text:
(I got enough. 
This should be enough to make 
a brush)
42001034.Chinese_Text:
（充分得到了。
这种程度的话，制作毛笔
就足够了）

42001035.Original_Text: (휴~ 힘들었다. 이 지역은 \n<textColor=[215:94:94:255]>묘면족</>과 <textColor=[215:94:94:255]>낙원족</> 때문에 \n조용할 틈이 없구나)
42001035.English_Text:
(Huh, it was hard. This area is 
<textColor=[215:94:94:255]>Myomyeon</> and <textColor=[215:94:94:255]>Paradise</> because of 
there is no room for quiet)
42001035.Chinese_Text:
（呼~好累啊这个地区
<textColor=[215:94:94:255]>妙面族</>和<textColor=[215:94:94:255]>乐园族</>，
没有安静的时间）

42001036.English_Text:
(Everyone has been killed. 
<textColor=[110:216:175:255]>Taerokrim</> has become quite safe 
it seems there are a lot of tourists)
42001036.Chinese_Text:
（都处理掉了。
太绿林</>变得相当安全
游客很多吧）

42001037.English_Text:
(Phew, I'm done. 
You'll be able to 
work safely for a while)
42001037.Chinese_Text:
（呼，结束了。
一段时间内安全
可以工作）

42001038.English_Text:
(I got them all. 
<textColor=[255:204:102:255]>Crocodile Skin</> always seems 
popular)
42001038.Chinese_Text:
（都救了。
雷克顿粥</>总是
看起来很受欢迎）

42001039.English_Text:
(Where the hell did it appear 
without end like this?)
42001039.Chinese_Text: （到底是在哪里这样没完没了地出现的呢？）

42001040.English_Text:
(Found!
I'll have to handle it with care)

42001041.English_Text:
(Hmm... it smells a little
strange
but it might be worth researching)
42001041.Chinese_Text:
（嗯..。气味虽然有点奇怪
但
应该有研究的价值吧）

42001042.Chinese_Text:
（<textColor=[78:148:215:255]>完成了雷达</>的协助
充分完成了）

42001043.English_Text:
((Complete 3 missions 
to help <textColor=[78:148:215:255]>Geumgyeongcheolmun</>
collect various materials 
)
42001043.Chinese_Text:
（<textColor=[78:148:215:255]>帮助金嘤铁门</>
完成收集各种材料的
任务）

42001044.English_Text:
((<textColor=[78:148:215:255]>Illustration </>)
All 3 collaborations
completed.
Are you expecting a reward?)
42001044.Chinese_Text:
（<textColor=[78:148:215:255]>桃花奖</>的合作
都完成了。
期待补偿？）

42001045.Chinese_Text:
（<textColor=[78:148:215:255]>水阳</>举报的
太绿林</>治安维持协议
全部结束）

42001046.Original_Text: (<textColor=[78:148:215:255]>영교원</> 협행을 완수했다. \n이정도면 협행 전문가라 \n불릴 수도 있겠는걸?)
42001046.English_Text:
(<textColor=[78:148:215:255]>Younggyowon</> collaboration has been completed. 
If this is enough, you can be called a collaboration expert?)
42001046.Chinese_Text:
（<textColor=[78:148:215:255]>完成了英教院</>协议。
这种程度的话，可以被称为悬赏专家
？）

42001047.Chinese_Text:
（<textColor=[110:216:175:255]>太绿林</>
明慧丹</>该举报的协议
全部完成）

42001048.English_Text:
(<textColor=[78:148:215:255]>Taerokrim</>'s residents
Complete all
2 cooperative actions reported by them)
42001048.Chinese_Text:
（<textColor=[78:148:215:255]>对太绿林的居民</>
希望能有所帮助）

42001049.English_Text:
(The surrounding threats have 
enough been removed.
Let's find the <textColor=[255:204:102:255]>Secret Book</>)
42001049.Chinese_Text:
（充分消除了周围的威胁。
寻找秘方</>）

42001050.English_Text:
(This gave me enough time to 
gather 
the <textColor=[255:204:102:255]>turtle eggs</>)
42001050.Chinese_Text:
（这种程度的话<textColor=[255:204:102:255]>龟卵</>
采集的时间
充分赚了）

42001051.Chinese_Text:
（好了！现在采集坚硬的
<textColor=[255:204:102:255]>植物茎</>）

42001052.English_Text:
(Phew, we killed them all. 
Let's recover <textColor=[255:204:102:255]>Botzym</> in this gap!)
42001052.Chinese_Text:
（呼，都处理掉了。
趁这个空隙<textColor=[255:204:102:255]>回收包袱</>！）

42001053.English_Text:
(This is enough.
Now let's get rid of the <textColor=[255:204:102:255]>garbage</>?)
42001053.Chinese_Text:
（这种程度就足够了。
现在<textColor=[255:204:102:255]>清理一下垃圾</>吧？）

42001054.Chinese_Text:
（<textColor=[255:204:102:255]>龟卵</>消除了周围的
威胁）

42002000.English_Text:
(I think this is enough to drive out 
the <textColor=[215:94:94:255]>Hongdon</>)
42002000.Chinese_Text:
（这种程度的话<textColor=[215:94:94:255]>红豚族</>
好像已经足够了）

42002001.English_Text:
(Huh, it was hard.
It's almost deaf)

42002002.Original_Text: (임무를 끝마쳤다. \n훈련생들이 다치지 않고 \n훈련할 수 있을 거야)
42002002.English_Text:
(Mission completed. 
The trainees will be able to train 
without getting hurt)
42002002.Chinese_Text:
（任务完成了。
训练生们不会受伤，
可以训练）

42002003.Original_Text: (후, 충분히 구했다.\n<textColor=[255:204:102:255]>독</>을 해독하기 위해\n<textColor=[255:204:102:255]>독</>이 필요한 상황이라니)
42002003.English_Text:
(After that, I got enough.
<textColor=[255:204:102:255]>Poison</> to decode
<textColor=[255:204:102:255]>Poison </> is necessary)
42002003.Chinese_Text:
（后，充分获得了。
为了解读毒</>
需要毒</>）

42002004.Chinese_Text:
（<textColor=[110:216:175:255]>谜底</>
好像变得更加干净了）

42002005.Original_Text: (<textColor=[255:204:102:255]>여우털</>을 모두 모았다. \n이 정도면 <textColor=[78:148:215:255]>명혜단</>이 \n붓을 만들기에 충분할 거야)
42002005.English_Text:
(<textColor=[255:204:102:255]>Fox hair</> collected.
This is enough <textColor=[78:148:215:255]>Myunghyedan</> >This 
will be enough to make a brush)
42002005.Chinese_Text:
（<textColor=[255:204:102:255]>狐狸毛</>都收集起来了。
这种程度的话<textColor=[78:148:215:255]>明慧丹</>
足以制作毛笔）

42002006.Chinese_Text:
（<textColor=[110:216:175:255]>森林的帐幕</>的<textColor=[215:94:94:255]>黑暗</>
完成了扫除任务）

42002007.English_Text:
(<textColor=[78:148:215:255]>The Pioneer Barongdan</> asked for
<textColor=[215:94:94:255]>Defeat the Black Dawn</> 
Mission completed)
42002007.Chinese_Text:
（<textColor=[78:148:215:255]>开拓巴隆丹</>拜托的
<textColor=[215:94:94:255]>黑色凌晨团</>退治
任务结束）

42002008.English_Text:
(Is this revolutionary 
Black? 
This should be enough)
42002008.Chinese_Text:
（这就是革命的
黑色吧？
这样就足够了）

42002009.English_Text:
(Bring wealth and 
drive away evil spirits... 
Should I bring one too?)
42002009.Chinese_Text:
（带来富贵
赶走杂鬼..。
我也要带一个吗？）

42002011.English_Text:
(All collected. 
This should be enough to study 
the <textColor=[255:204:102:255]>Traces of the Rift</>)
42002011.Chinese_Text:
（都收集齐了。
这种程度的话<textColor=[255:204:102:255]>裂纹的常见</>
研究就足够了）

42002012.English_Text:
(Phew, finished.
Hiding and gathering <textColor=[255:204:102:255]>herb</>,
<textColor=[78:148:215:255]> Barong</> is really great)
42002012.Chinese_Text:
（呼，结束了。
躲起来<textColor=[255:204:102:255]>采集药草</>，
巴隆</>真了不起）

42002013.Chinese_Text:
（…好像是普通的野草…
首先<textColor=[78:148:215:255]>给巴隆</>们
带过去比较好）

42002014.Chinese_Text:
（这程度就可以了吧？
用作装饰品
看起来很合适）

42002015.Original_Text: (제법 많이 모았다.\n생, 건조, 반건조, 냉동까지\n시험할 수 있을 양이다)
42002015.English_Text:
(I have collected quite a lot.
This amount can be tested from raw, dried, semi-dried, frozen, etc.)
42002015.Chinese_Text:
（收集了很多。
生、干、半干、冷冻都可以测试）

42002016.Chinese_Text:
（虽然处理了很多，
士兵们休息的话
看起来还很危险）

42002017.Original_Text: (휴, 이 정도면 충분해. \n<textColor=[78:148:215:255]>도화상전</>은 염료 개발에 \n많은 투자를 하는 것 같군)
42002017.English_Text:
(Whew, that's enough. 
<textColor=[78:148:215:255]>Paintings</> seems to be investing a lot in 
the development of dyes)
42002017.Chinese_Text:
（呼，这程度就足够了。
<textColor=[78:148:215:255]>桃花奖</>在染料开发上
好像投资很多）

42002018.English_Text:
(Finally finished.
I hope it has the skills
expected by artisans)
42002018.Chinese_Text:
（终于结束了。
希望有匠人期待的能力。）

42002019.Original_Text: (모두 모았다. <textColor=[215:94:94:255]>유강독모</>에 \n내성을 가진 물질이 있다면\n큰 도움이 될텐데...)
42002019.English_Text:
(Collected all. <textColor=[215:94:94:255]>Venus Venom</>
It would be of great help if there is a substance that is 
tolerant...)
42002019.Chinese_Text:
（都收集齐了。<textColor=[215:94:94:255]>柳江毒毛</>
如果有耐性的物质，
会有很大的帮助…）

42002020.English_Text:
((<textColor=[215:94:94:255]>Cinnamon</>>what are you trying to do with the organization 
?
Is this enough?)
42002020.Chinese_Text:
（<textColor=[215:94:94:255]>淡醋</>组织
要做什么？
这样就足够了吧？）

42002021.English_Text:
(For the time being, craftsmen will be able 
to safely dig stones)
42002021.Chinese_Text:
（暂时工匠们
可以安全地挖石头
）

42002022.English_Text: (Good leather. I can make high-quality parchment paper)
42002022.Chinese_Text:
（好皮革。高级
可以制作羊皮纸）

42002023.English_Text:
(hmm... it just looks like an old
rusty tool)
42002023.Chinese_Text:
（嗯..。只是太久了
看起来像生锈的工具）

42002024.Original_Text: (<textColor=[110:216:175:255]>비옥 대지</>는 아직 위험한 \n곳이 많아서 <textColor=[78:148:215:255]>바롱</>이 약초를 \n구하기 힘들 것 같아)
42002024.English_Text:
(<textColor=[110:216:175:255]>Fertile lands</> still has a lot of 
dangerous places on it, so <textColor=[78:148:215:255]>Barong</> Herbs seem to be hard to find)
42002024.Chinese_Text:
（<textColor=[110:216:175:255]>肥沃大地</>还有很多危险的
地方<textColor=[78:148:215:255]>巴隆</>这个药草
好像很难买到）

42002025.Original_Text: (<textColor=[215:94:94:255]>홍돈족</>을 쫓아냈다.\n하지만 그들이 <textColor=[110:216:175:255]>붉은 숲길</>을\n쉽게 포기할 것 같진 않다)
42002025.English_Text:
(<textColor=[215:94:94:255]>The Red Dons</> were kicked out.
But they <textColor=[110:216:175:255]>Red Forest Road</> 
I don't think I'll give up easily)
42002025.Chinese_Text:
（<textColor=[215:94:94:255]>赶走了红敦族</>。
但是他们<textColor=[110:216:175:255]>红色森林路</>
好像不会轻易放弃。）

42002026.Original_Text: (<textColor=[78:148:215:255]>매화단</>의 장비에 비해서 \n투박해 보이지만, \n조사를 해볼 만은 하다)
42002026.English_Text:
((<textColor=[78:148:215:255]>It looks clunky compared to the Discipline</>'s equipment,
but it's worth investigating)
42002026.Chinese_Text:
（<textColor=[78:148:215:255]>梅花团</>的装备相比
看起来粗糙，
值得调查）

42002027.English_Text:
(Phew, I'm done.
It'll be fine for a while)
42002027.Chinese_Text:
（呼，结束了。
暂时不会有问题）

42002028.English_Text:
((<textColor=[78:148:215:255]>Pungbaekmun</> completed
2 collaborations.
Let's receive the reward)
42002028.Chinese_Text:
（<textColor=[78:148:215:255]>风白门</>的协议
完成2件。
领取奖励）

42002029.English_Text:
(
<textColor=[78:148:215:255]>Geumgyeongcheolmun</>'s passion for good materials
never cools)
42002029.Chinese_Text:
（对好材料的
<textColor=[78:148:215:255]>金嘤铁门</>的热情
不冷却啊）

42002030.English_Text:
(Complete 2 collaborations of <textColor=[78:148:215:255]>Dosangjeon</> in Fertile Land.
Receive the reward)
42002030.Chinese_Text:
（在肥沃的大地上完成了<textColor=[78:148:215:255]>桃花像</>的
悬赏2件。
领取奖励）

42002031.English_Text:
(<textColor=[78:148:215:255]>Discipline</>Completed
2 collaborations
requested.
Let's collect the reward)
42002031.Chinese_Text:
（<textColor=[78:148:215:255]>水阳</>委托的协议
完成2件。
领取奖励）

42002033.Chinese_Text:
（<textColor=[78:148:215:255]>明慧丹</>委托的
协助完成2件）

42002034.English_Text:
(<textColor=[78:148:215:255]>Residents of Fertile Lands</>
Completed
2 collaborations directly requested by them)
42002034.Chinese_Text:
（<textColor=[78:148:215:255]>肥沃大地的居民</>
希望能有所帮助）

42002047.Chinese_Text:
（周围的威胁
充分消除了）

42002051.English_Text:
(이걸 후식으로 먹었다고?
소화에 도움이 되는 걸까?)
42002051.Chinese_Text:
（我吃了这晚餐？
它有助于消化吗？）

42002052.Original_Text: (이걸로 더 좋은 장비를\n만들 수 있다면 좋겠군)
42002052.English_Text:
(이걸로 더 좋은 장비를
만들 수 있다면 좋겠군)
42002052.Chinese_Text:
（我有更好的设备
我希望你能做到）

42002053.English_Text:
(독도 잘 쓰면
약으로 사용할 수 있구나)

42002054.English_Text:
(확실히 껍질이 딱딱해서
공격이 잘 먹히지 않겠어)
42002054.Chinese_Text:
（绝对壳很难
攻击将无法吃得很好）

42002057.Chinese_Text:
仪式）>仪式
我可以刺穿防守吗？

42002058.Chinese_Text:
（我看到了国家的情况......
让我们收集一次）

42002059.Chinese_Text:
为什么这武器
我想知道我是否使用过它）

42002061.Chinese_Text:
（周围有敌人）。
离开它是不容易的。

42002062.Original_Text: (조사도 좋지만...\n위험한 곳은 피하는 게 좋을 텐데)
42002062.English_Text:
(조사도 좋지만...
위험한 곳은 피하는 게 좋을 텐데)
42002062.Chinese_Text:
（조사좋좋사）
避免危险的地方会更好）

42002063.Chinese_Text:
（突然<textColor=[215:94:94:255]>蜘蛛</>
我很尴尬，我会逃跑。
